defaultPageDescription: It matters to spread the message. Out with it.
title: Top Ten
step_one_title: Love yourself the way you are
step_one_text: Be your own best friend. Love yourself and don’t compare yourself to others.
step_two_title: Put your phone down and get lost in the moment.
step_two_text: Don’t allow your phone to take you out of the moment. Enjoy your life with good friends.
step_three_text: Step out of your comfort zone and experience new things. Life is full of exciting opportunities.
step_four_title: Get enough sleep, eat well and exercise.
step_four_text: Take good care of yourself. Physical health supports mental well-being.
step_five_text: You are the boss of your own life and you don’t need to please others. Sometimes no is the right answer.
step_six_title: Have a positive mindset and enjoy.
step_six_text: Direct your mind in a positive direction. Be thankful and enjoy what you have.
step_seven_text: Don’t give up on your dreams when things don’t go your way. The more resilience, the sweeter the victory.
step_eight_text: Be there for your friends when they’re going through a hard time. True friendship is one of the most valuable gifts of life.
step_nine_title: Don’t be afraid to make mistakes, learn from your experiences.
step_nine_text: Keep trying and accept challenges. Mistakes are a natural part of life.
step_ten_title: Tell someone and seek help if you don’t feel well.
step_ten_text: The first step towards feeling better is always telling someone. When a problem is put into words, the solution is around the corner.
